item.title: Approximate MVBB Visualizer
item.author: dragan.vule98@gmail.com (Dragan Vuletic)
item.description: Tool for computing and visualizing an approximate Minimum Volume Bounding Box (MVBB) given a 3D Model. The algorithm is based on the ‘’Efficiently Approximating the Minimum-Volume Bounding Box of a Point Set in Three Dimensions’’ paper from Barequet and Har-Peled. For some internal algorithms I used those provided with the CGAL library.
